Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns

Class SelectElement

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.Element
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns.SelectElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dropdown
public class SelectElement
extends Element
Extends Element. Is intended to be a a base class for Dropdown.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.Element

    driver, name, selectors

    SelectElement​(java.lang.String elementName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> selectors)

  • Constructor Details

    • SelectElement

      public SelectElement​(java.lang.String elementName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> selectors)
      Implementation of a Element to initialize how an element is going to be found when it is worked on by the WebDriver class. Takes a reference to the WebDriver class that will be exercising its functionality.
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element
      selectors - Map<String,String> the list of selectors to use to find the element

  • Method Details

    • select

      public SelectElement select​(java.lang.String selectText)
      Selects an option from a drop down using the text value of the item to select.
      Parameters:
      selectText - the value to select
      Returns:
      PageSelectElement for object chaining

    • select

      public SelectElement select​(int index)
      Selects an option from a drop down using the ordinal value of the item to select.
      Parameters:
      index - the index to select
      Returns:
      PageSelectElement for object chaining

    • select

      public SelectElement select​(SelectorType selectorType, java.lang.String selectText)
      Selects an option from a drop down. Allows for selection by value in addition to selection by text or index.
      Parameters:
      selectorType - com.dougnoel.sentinel.enums.SelectorType INDEX, VALUE, TEXT
      selectText - the value of the selector
      Returns:
      PageSelectElement for object chaining

    • getText

      public java.lang.String getText​(int index)
      Gets the value of the item at the given index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index to inspect
      Returns:
      String the text value of the option at the given index

    • getSelectedText

      public java.lang.String getSelectedText()
      Gets the text of the first item currently selected.
      Returns:
      String the text value of the selected option
